name: com.unity.ugui
description: Unity's in-game UI system used to create in-game user interfaces fast and intuitively. Using a couple included components such as a panel, and buttons you can create a basic main menu for your application.

Unity UI is a set of tools for developing user interfaces for games and applications. It is a GameObject-based UI system that uses Components and the Game View to arrange, position, and style user interfaces. â€‹ You cannot use Unity UI to create or change user interfaces in the Unity Editor.
